title: I need some help from the type geeks
content:
i was wondering if any of you guys have any real life examples of documents, books, posters...etc that use the typeface thesis

all i need is a couple of images of a couple of documents.  
even if you just know about any print work that used this typeface, let me know please, i’ll take care of getting the print.

appreciate it

 [‹ Quality Paper / Ink](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41825 "Go to previous forum topic") [Another hand lettered design ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41776 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jlahham

comments.content:
Swiss telecommunications company Swisscom use it for their logo

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/logo_partner_swisscom_6048.gif)

along with TheMix

[http://zoll-kommunikation.com/blog/uploaded\_images/swisscom\_dialogue\_pri...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025/http:/zoll-kommunikation.com/blog/uploaded_images/swisscom_dialogue_print.jpg "http://zoll-kommunikation.com/blog/uploaded\_images/swisscom\_dialogue\_print.jpg")

’nother one

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/kkm_4979.jpg)

(by Bruno Krucker and Arthur Rüegg,  
Niggli publishers, ISBN 978-3-7212-0416-2)

From my own archives:

[http://www.amazon.com/Teun-Hocks-Janet-Koplos/dp/1931788782/ref=pd\_bbs\_s...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025/http:/www.amazon.com/Teun-Hocks-Janet-Koplos/dp/1931788782/ref=pd_bbs_sr_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1202189833&sr=1-1 "http://www.amazon.com/Teun-Hocks-Janet-Koplos/dp/1931788782/ref=pd\_bbs\_sr\_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1202189833&sr=1-1")

[http://www.amazon.com/Country-Living-Storage-Style-Practical/dp/15881666...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025/http:/www.amazon.com/Country-Living-Storage-Style-Practical/dp/1588166600/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1202189634&sr=1-1 "http://www.amazon.com/Country-Living-Storage-Style-Practical/dp/1588166600/ref=sr\_1\_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1202189634&sr=1-1")

[http://www.amazon.com/Country-Living-Collection-Style-Displaying/dp/1588...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025/http:/www.amazon.com/Country-Living-Collection-Style-Displaying/dp/1588165663/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1202189670&sr=1-1 "http://www.amazon.com/Country-Living-Collection-Style-Displaying/dp/1588165663/ref=sr\_1\_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1202189670&sr=1-1")

I’ll try to think of others, I’ve used these fonts a bunch.

A few more from Typophile search:

[http://www.typophile.com/node/19504](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19504 "http://www.typophile.com/node/19504")  
 [http://www.typophile.com/node/18770](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18770 "http://www.typophile.com/node/18770")

keep going down:  
 [http://www.google.com/search?num=20&hl=en&q=site%3Atypophile.com+thesans...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025/http:/www.google.com/search?num=20&hl=en&q=site%3Atypophile.com+thesans&btnG=Search "http://www.google.com/search?num=20&hl=en&q=site%3Atypophile.com+thesans&btnG=Search")  
 [http://www.google.com/search?num=20&hl=en&q=site%3Atypophile.com+themix&...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025/http:/www.google.com/search?num=20&hl=en&q=site%3Atypophile.com+themix&btnG=Search "http://www.google.com/search?num=20&hl=en&q=site%3Atypophile.com+themix&btnG=Search")  
 [http://www.google.com/search?num=20&hl=en&q=site%3Atypophile.com+theseri...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025/http:/www.google.com/search?num=20&hl=en&q=site%3Atypophile.com+theserif&btnG=Search "http://www.google.com/search?num=20&hl=en&q=site%3Atypophile.com+theserif&btnG=Search")

[ARD](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025/http:/www.ard.de/)/ [Das Erste](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025/http:/www.daserste.de/) (Germany’s principal public TV channel) uses [Thesis](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Thesis). So does its television news service, the [Tagesschau](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203223025/http:/www.tagesschau.de/).
